code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Box,Heading,Grommet,DropButton}from'grommet';import TaskBoard from'./components/TaskBoard.js';import NewTask from'./components/NewTask.js';import{getTasks,deleteTask,editTask,changeTaskStatus,createTask}from'./utils/api.js';import'./app.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const handleCreateTask=(task,description,tags)=>{createTask(task,description,tags).then(result=>{setTasks([...tasks,result]);}).catch(error=>console.log('error',error));};useEffect(()=>{getTasks().then(data=>{const updatedTasks=data||[];if(updatedTasks!==tasks){setTasks(updatedTasks);}}).catch(error=>console.log('error getting tasks',error));},[tasks]);useEffect(()=>{console.log(tasks);},[tasks]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grommet,{theme:{global:{font:{family:"Roboto"}}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{align:"center",gap:"medium",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{level:"1",children:" Task Manager "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DropButton,{label:"New Task",dropContent:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewTask,{createTask:handleCreateTask}),dropAlign:{top:"bottom"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskBoard,{tasks:tasks,editTask:editTask,deleteTask:deleteTask,changeTaskStatus:changeTaskStatus})]})})});}export default App;
